document_data.name: The Dungeon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dungeon''' was a [[tavern]] located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Dungeon was located in the eastern section of Skuld in the [[Skuld/Crafts District|Crafts District]] in the southwest section of the district near the gateway to the [[Skuld/Central Ward|Central Ward]].
